changelog:
Major Update 2.0.0:
- New Character: A brand new fighter joins the roster!
- Graphics Overhaul: Added professional Hit Effects & Post-Processing Bloom.
- Performance: Significant optimization for smoother gameplay.
- UI Upgrade: Enhanced Character Selection Screen with high-quality TextMeshPro support.
- Multiplayer: Fixed critical connection stability issues.
